ModulePrefs.title: Open-Tran.eu
ModulePrefs.description: Open-Tran.eu - easy access to the translations of open source projects
ModulePrefs.author: Jacek Åšliwerski

Module.Content:
<script>
function formsubmit(){
     location.href = "/suggest/" + document.search_form.q.value;
     return false;
}

function displaySearchBar (prefs) {
     var lang = prefs.getString("lang");
     if (lang == "") {
       lang = prefs.getString(".lang");
     }
     var html =
         '<form name="search_form" method="get" action="http://' + lang +
           '.open-tran.eu/suggest" onsubmit="return formsubmit();">' +
	   '<input type="text" name="q" maxlength="450" />' +
	   '<input type="submit" value="Translate" />' +
         '<form>';
     document.write(html);
}
   displaySearchBar(new _IG_Prefs(__MODULE_ID__));
   _IG_Analytics("UA-664123-3", "/google-gadget");
</script>
